Message:
so he had a lot of helpers
around him all the time.

Some of them said
very cruel things to me,
but that’s alright.

After all, I’m the one
Master trusts to help him
whenever he needs something.

He trusts me to carry
really heavy things,
and to draw away bandits
when we travel.
He trusts me with all of it...

Once, I got separated from
everyone in the mountains.

It took me five whole days
to get home...
...and when I did, Master was so...

A-Anyway, I’m very fortunate.
And happy. I am.

One day, Master took me out
with him to some ancient ruins.
He did.

When we got there,
he ordered me...

He told me not to move
an inch from this spot.
